name: Galoo
tag_list: buyers-marketplace, ecommerce, shopping, online-marketplace, online-shopping, internet-shopping, online-buyers-marketplace, new-concept-to-buy, sales-channel
overview:
Galoo brings the art of negotiation to online trade and social shopping. It is a “patented” reverse buying platform that assists buyers in making intelligent pricing and sourcing decisions by letting them create their own buyer requests that are sent to thousands of sellers locally and worldwide for any product or service required.

Unlike traditional auctions, daily deal or shopping sites, Buyers can search the Galoo site or create their own buyer requests by making an offer on the advertised price for listed Products or simply filling out a quick and easy online form, request a Service at the price they are willing to pay.

Buyers can also invite friends in order to strengthen their negotiating position through facebook, twitter and other social media sites or invite their favourite sellers to participate in the seller network themselves.

Alternatively, buyers can also use the “Buy Now” button if the savings are already listed through Galoo’s Price Comparison Partners.

The Galoo savings calculator also displays the buyer’s savings upon completion of the transaction and allow Buyers to contribute part of their savings to the charity of their choice through the Galoo save and donate system.

All Sellers are invited to sign up to list the products and services they provide, as well as the geographic region taht they sell or offer their service in.

Buy, sell, barter & save on everything you want & need!

As a virtual worldwide shopping mall Galoo helps buyers save time, money and effort by bringing everything they want and need together in one place.

That includes tens of 1,000s of Buyers, Sellers, products and services to “Oooh!” and “Aaah!” over with every visit to the secure Galoo.com database.

What’s more, Galoo’s world is where everything is up for negotiation. The patented “reverse buying” concept puts a revolutionary twist on age old principles which have brought Buyers and Sellers together for centuries. In short, haggling and negotiation reign supreme in the Galoo marketplace.
